MajorClaims.Text: universities should invest in libraries more than anywhere else

Claims.Text: They are critical part of universities and a good university has to have a modern library
All professors and students need to have a modern and well-equipped library
it does not have the same priority of library has
there are good ways for sports activities to compensate their expenses, but it is very hard for libraries to find a good way for have an income
investing in libraries has a long-time result

Premises.Text: a library is vital and strategical part of a university
after internet, library plays an important role in research
only small part of students attend sport activities
in my university number of students who use the library is much more than students do sports activities
universities support is vital for libraries
Most libraries are free not for students also for public
usually libraries do not have income
sport activities have a good income
every sport has different matches and for each match they have a lot sponsors
they have this chance to sell their important matches tickets
a library can buy a lot of new books or they can buy more computers
Most of the library facilities are stable and you can use them for a long time
in the far future, they become more valuable
most sports facilities except buildings are usually can be used in short-time and they are not persistent for a long-time
